item.title: Claire Collord add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "I haven't the slightest idea how to change people, but still I keep a long list of prospective candidates just in case I should ever figure it out." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Claire Collord add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "All of us take pride and pleasure in the fact that we are unique, but I'm afraid that when all is said and done the police are right: it all comes down to fingerprints." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Claire Collord add a quote by Nick Hornby
item.description: "How do people, like, not curse? How is it possible? There are these gaps in speech where you just have to put a "fuck." I'll tell you who the most admirable people in the world are: newscasters. If that was me, I'd be like, "And the motherfuckers flew the fucking plane right into the Twin Towers." How could you not, if you're a human being? Maybe they're not so admirable. Maybe they're robot zombies." -- Nick Hornby

item.title: Claire Collord add a quote by Sarah Vowell
item.description: "Despite his consistent party-line voting record, some independents and Democrats still think of Senator McCain as the most palatable, independent-minded Republican. But this is the sort of empty compliment a friend of mine once compared to being called â€œthe coolest Osmond." -- Sarah Vowell

item.title: Claire Collord add a quote by Sarah Vowell
item.description: "Like Lincoln, I would like to believe the ballot is stronger than the bullet. Then again, he said that before he got shot." -- Sarah Vowell

item.title: Claire Collord add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new." -- Albert Einstein
